name: MySCHONBEK
0:
”Alexa, turn off Bedroom Fan”
”Alexa, turn on Kitchen Fan”
”Alexa, brighten my Living Room light by fifty percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Schonbek is designed to adapt to your routine, reduce energy costs, make life beautiful and simpler all year-round.

MySCHONBEK for Amazon Echo integration allows you to sync up your Fandelier Fan(s)/Lights(s) with an Amazon Echo device to enable voice-activated commands and more.

To get started, select the "ENABLE" button in your Alexa app and log in. Authorize the link to the Schonbek account used with your MySCHONBEK app, and then Alexa will discover devices. For more details, see Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa. 

You can also use Alexa groups to control multiple Schonbek Smart Fans. For example, add the Schonbek Smart Fans and lights in your Office, Den, home theater, first floor bar, and recreation rooms to an Alexa group named "Basement." Say, "Alexa, set Basement lights to 60%," and Alexa will dim the lights in those rooms.

Tell Alexa to turn on or control a Schonbek Smart device that is in a room. For example, "Alexa, turn on Kitchen light."

You can use Alexa to:
Turn fans or lights on or off. For example, "Alexa, turn on Bedroom fan."
Change fan speed. For example, "Alexa, increase Dining Room fan speed to 6" or "Alexa, set Dining Room fan speed to 3."
Change light brightness. For example, "Alexa, set Library lights to 85%" or "Alexa, brighten Library lights to 99%".
Change fan season modes. For example, “Alexa, Set Bedroom fan to Summer season” or “Alexa, Set Bedroom fan to Winter season” or “Alexa, Set Bedroom fan season to Summer” or “Alexa, Set Bedroom fan season to Winter”.

For questions or comments, please visit our website at: https://schonbek.com
